name: auth_microservice
description: This project is a microservice built on Express for authentication using Json Web Tokens (JWT). Authentication is made with email and password. Users are identified with an uuid. This microservice supports token invalidation through a Redis instance, using the whitelist approach.

scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.normal-build-start: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.normal-build-start-inspect: npm run build && npm run start-inspect
scripts.clean-start: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.clean-start-inspect: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run start-inspect
